arguments.template:
<chart
      [legend]="false"
      [view]="view" >
      <svg:g [attr.transform]="transform" class="pie-grid chart">
        <svg:g
          *ngFor="let series of series"
          class="pie-grid-item"
          [attr.transform]="series.transform">

          <svg:g pieGridSeries
            [colors]="series.colors"
            [data]="series.data"
            [innerRadius]="series.innerRadius"
            [outerRadius]="series.outerRadius"
            (clickHandler)="click($event)"

            swui-tooltip
            [tooltipPlacement]="'top'"
            [tooltipType]="'tooltip'"
            [tooltipTitle]="series.label + ': ' + series.value" 
          />

          <svg:text
            class="label"
            dy="-0.5em"
            x="0"
            y="5"
            text-anchor="middle">
            {{series.percent}}
          </svg:text>

          <svg:text
            class="label"
            dy="0.5em"
            x="0"
            y="5"
            text-anchor="middle">
            {{series.label}}
          </svg:text>

          <svg:text
            class="label"
            dy="1.23em"
            x="0"
            [attr.y]="series.outerRadius"
            text-anchor="middle">
            {{series.total}}
          </svg:text>

        </svg:g>
      </svg:g>
    </chart>
